website_summaries.verdict: These moist, fudgy brownie bars are an ideal snack for those pursuing a low-carb lifestyle, whether formally participating in the Atkins diet or not.
pros: Packing a nice 7g of protein, no sugar, 2g of net carbs and 6g of fiber per bar
Some people report a “Snickers bar” taste
cons: The sugar alcohols in these bars can have negative GI effects on some users
Contains soy, milk, and walnuts, which are common allergens

customer_reviews.title: 100% NOT Keto Friendly
customer_reviews.text: The only real sweeteners that are keto friendly would be Stevia, Erythritol, Monk Fruit, etc where the glycemic load is 1 or less. The majority of sweeteners here are well above that. For reference, fructose has a glycemic index of 25. Contained in this product: Maltitol - 35 Polydextrose - 4 to 9 Lactitol - 3 to 7 With that said, this product WILL cause insulin spikes as your body processes these sweeteners (mostly maltitol, which is a huge no-no for keto) differently than things like Stevia, Erythritol, etc. In some cases, even more than real sugar. Stay educated, and stay away from anything with Maltitol, Dextrose, Maltodextrin, Polydextrose, etc.
customer_reviews.author: J.T. Shaver

customer_reviews.title: Kinda gross, but okay for desperation
customer_reviews.text: I am doing low carb, but my sweet tooth has not gotten the message yet. I decided to try these, as they were offered as an add-on for a reasonable price. I was NOT impressed. If you are dying for chocolate (and we've all been there), then these are better than sugary treats for low carb folks. But, I didn't care for the flavor very much, and the artificial sweetener they use causes copious amounts of gas! Overall, not the worst thing I've ever tasted, but never pay full price for these!! They are also not on my re-purchase list either.
customer_reviews.author: KatyKatMidwestTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: These are REALLY good. I love chocolate but I am very particular ...
customer_reviews.text: These are REALLY good. I love chocolate but I am very particular about it. I've tried other chocolaty keto or protein bars and they always tasted kind of chalky and weird. These are really good and saves me having to make my own fat bombs. I wish the box would be larger. Just added this as my first every monthly subscription.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Wow!!
customer_reviews.text: I was kinda hesistant to purchase Atkins after starting to reduce carbs in my diet but I am VERY surprised by these. They are delicious. Like a true fudgey brownie bar. I can't imagine what it's like warmed up, gonna try that next! I will definitely be purchasing again and trying other Atkins products!
customer_reviews.author: Aleesa Kate

customer_reviews.title: I like, I like, more please
customer_reviews.text: God I love these. I just saw the brownie picture and bought it. I didn't know it's for weight loss. How can it be when I eat 4 in a row? Thankfully I'm at a good weight. Otherwise, I'd be way skinnier. I buy these once a month. I try to buy more fattening things now to offset these.. OK I'm being sarcastic. It's too bad one has to put a disclaimer like that but there are some of us that can't get jokes like that, even if you put one in their mouth. Eating 4 at a time is true. Need to buy 2 boxes next month.
customer_reviews.author: WillChill

customer_reviews.title: Contain Maltitol which is known to cause stomach distress
customer_reviews.text: These bars taste fine for a low carb option. As expected they are processed and have an oddly sweet aftertaste. However, they are made with a large amount of an artificial sweetener called Maltitol. You might be familiar with this sweetener if your doctor recommended it to treat constipation, or you were unlucky enough to eat more than one of these bars at a time and spend the rest of your day in the bathroom. Your body can’t fully digest maltitol, which can lead to bloating, gas and more time spent on your toilet than you'd like. I threw them out after one bite since I checked the ingredient list and know its effects, but wanted to warn everyone else.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor hooks

customer_reviews.title: The Incredible Shrinking Bar
customer_reviews.text: I love the taste of these bars, but the last couple of boxes we purchased were a rip-off. The size of the packaging stays the same, but the bars are about half the size that they used to be, and they are using fewer and fewer peanuts. Hey, Atkins, if you're going to cut the size of the bars down by half, maybe you should cut down the packaging by half also, and quit trying to fool people into thinking they are getting a regular size bar. And also cut the price, not raise it.
customer_reviews.author: Charles C.

customer_reviews.title: Atkins candies
customer_reviews.text: Well the taste is really good, however it was completely Melted together. I threw the first box I opened into the trash. Not sure what I’ll Do with the other box. I had also ordered the chocolate and caramel squares and the Same thing happened. Each individual square had melted or softened so the caramel just kinda leaked Out when I opened it. I advise waiting until the Fall to order again. Best if you are able to drive, just go to your grocery Store to buy these 🙂
customer_reviews.author: SN

customer_reviews.title: Wasteful
customer_reviews.text: Was so excited to receive this ( Nutty Fudge Brownies ) ! Only to be disappointed, received with boxes smelling like chemicals, cleaning product. No way was I taking a chance and threw ALL away . At first I thought it was me, so I had my friends smell inside of box with product, they said same thing. Disgusting.... I did not return knowing you can not return food, what a waste !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Maltitol can not be subtracted from the total carbs
customer_reviews.text: If you do any research you'll find that not all sugar alcohols are the same. Maltitol impacts your blood sugar almost as much as sugar does. These are not really 2 net carbs as advertised. Look for products with Erythritol. The body does not process it at all and you can subtract the entire amount from total carbs along with the fiber. Do research on sugar alcohols if you're doing a low carb diet. Don't trust Atkins.
customer_reviews.author: HMG

customer_reviews.title: Yummy snackage
customer_reviews.text: We love this stuff !! Much better price than in the store. I originally gave five stars BUT hadn't opened the package yet. Please see the photo. ALL four boxes and every package came out like these almonds--they seem melted or something. Too hot in the storage warehouse???? We threw them out.
customer_reviews.author: Reedster

customer_reviews.title: Good taste and diarrhea
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing if you’re looking to lose weight and also get some diarrhea. Yes, diarrhea. Turns out, they use Alcohol Sugar Malitol as sweetener and the most common side affect is diarrhea. So, this yummy and all but the diarrhea is real!
customer_reviews.author: Summu

customer_reviews.title: Really good
customer_reviews.text: The flavor of these is quite good. I'll be buying them again. One downside, though, is that the chocolate on the first one I tried (the only one I've eaten so far) was a bit oxidized, like it was a bit old or had been stored in a very dry place. That is to say the chocolate had a slight white film that was not wax. The use by date was within specs, so I ate it and it tasted okay, but I didn't expect an oxidized bar. I don't like to mess around with returning an item that isn't absolutely ruined, and like I said, the flavor was good, so it was okay.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Ritchey

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: These taste pretty good, not overly sweet and the sweetness doesn't have a chemical taste like some low carb products. My only complaint is that they put the box into an envelope and shipped it in the mail. Not only did it take 2 weeks to receive my order, but the brownies were mashed up in the package. Otherwise I would give these 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Juliette Clark

customer_reviews.title: A white discoloration and the taste was off.
customer_reviews.text: The expiration on the box is Oct 2019 and it is only Mar 2019. Disappointed by the white discoloration knowing this is a sign of old chocolate. Being coconut the taste was off it was kind of rancid. I'm better off buying these at a supermarket; chances of being fresh are a lot better. Waste of money and because it's a food item no refund.
customer_reviews.author: rline66

customer_reviews.title: These tastes good for those trying to do low carb - and almonds are good for you
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite Atkins treats as almonds are very good for you and to me these have a good tasting chocolate outer layer that won't leave a bad after taste and won't leave you feeling guilty you ate them. There is also no stomach issues after eating like some other products out there. The only issue is that you want to eat more as they come in small bags - but this can also help you maintain portion control and get you used to eating the correct snack amounts. If you give it some time after eating you will notice it does provide you some maintain as the almonds have protein in them naturally.
customer_reviews.author: RAV

customer_reviews.title: Delish!
customer_reviews.text: I just lost over 20lbs in 6 weeks on a keto style diet and am planning to keep it off. I was looking for something with lowish carbs for when I NEED a little chocolate kick! These are yummy. I find that they are too big for me, so I split them in half in and put the other half in a snack-sized Ziploc for another day. They are more the consistency of fudge than a brownie, which is fine by me. Perfect for what I was looking for. Definitely going to be my go-to chocolate fix.
customer_reviews.author: Cosmicethos

customer_reviews.title: Best I have found so far.
customer_reviews.text: Not a real fan of most of the keto and low carb choices for snack bars out on the market but these are wonderful !! The only draw back so far is the little bit of after taste you get when finished the first one. Over all after you finish the first box you will be hooked on them. The price is affordable and well worth it. I have now tried several different ones but this is my favorite bar out of them so far. Give them a try you will love them.
customer_reviews.author: M.LewisTop Contributor: Knitting

customer_reviews.title: Sweetness without all the sugar!
customer_reviews.text: According to Atkins, these are Keto-friendly “treats”. And they ARE TREATS!! I’m starting a ketogenic diet for health and weight loss, but I knew my sweet tooth might do me in. So I looked for Keto-friendly snacks and found these very economical Atkins treats. The bars are small. And sometimes the chocolate is melted onto the wrapper, making it difficult to remove-that’s the reason for the 4 stars. You would NEVER imagine for a second that these mouth-watering delicious treats are low carb. There are only 2 grams net carb, with 0 gum sugar, 6 gum fiber, and 7 gum protein. Eat them slowly, let them melt in your mouth, and enjoy sweetness without all the sugar!
customer_reviews.author: Sany123Top Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: These are a nice little treat, if you heat them up!
customer_reviews.text: Sooooo these have potential! I ate one regular and it was alright. It did not have a "diet" or bitter taste. Some people said it wasn't as flavorful as a real brownie and I can see that. But here's the game changer, I heated one up for about 30 seconds and it was MUCH better. Yes it was a little gooey because of the exterior chocolate coating. (Think kind of like a candy bar) I would definitely buy these again. They just add a little different treat. I'm keto, but obviously not strict. It didn't cause a spike in my blood sugar and no weird weight fluctuation.
customer_reviews.author: Bel

customer_reviews.title: Nope.
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what these reviewers have been eating, but these do not taste good...they definitely don't taste like chocolate. (Not even like the cheap/fake "chocolate" like some holiday candy does). No way these will satisfy any craving for chocolate. In fact, they're so dissatisfying, you'll probably grab a different treat to "cleanse your palette". I wanted these to taste good, hell, just decent enough to satisfy a chocolate craving. But, they don't satisfy anything. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Satisfies my cravings without the carbs and sugar!
customer_reviews.text: I am on Keto and can’t live without my sweets so thank God for Atkins! These kind of taste like the Little Debbie fudge brownies minus the huge carb & sugar amounts in LD! They are actually good and helps me to feel like I am not being deprived of chocolate! Best price seems to be on Amazon, saw them for $2+ more at other stores and sites!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin M.

customer_reviews.title: Terrible and not worth.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first review ever. First these taste horrible. Also these contain Maltitol. If you are on a low carb diet such as Keto or even Atkins you should not consume Maltitol. It has been shown to raise blood sugar and increase response in insulin. Many who eat this are eating for the purpose of been on carb restriction diet and or may have diabetes. This product is almost as similar to eating a regular brownie except a regular brownie actually taste good. Atkins needs to be held accountable for this type of destructive profiting.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Horrible aftertaste that lasts
customer_reviews.text: These taste really good while you are eating them. They taste like a payday bar, but a bit chewier. The size is nice for a snack. However, the aftertaste from the sugar substitute is so horribly awful! I ate 2 other things trying to get this taste out of my mouth. I wish I had not bought them.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Payne

customer_reviews.title: You can't go wrong with this is delicious
customer_reviews.text: Now I bought this because I love chocolate and I love brownie even though I'm in this keto journey I wanted a chocolate fix without the guilt. I took a gamble due to the reviews that I saw and I have to stay forget the reviews especially the negative ones. This is for the true chocolate lovers as delicious as I tell you one thing I am a fanatic of chocolate and I'm very picky when it comes to chocolate. But this hits all the right notes you cannot go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Coco Medina

customer_reviews.title: Great treat
customer_reviews.text: I'm on dirty keto , and these were pretty good. The after taste was not as rich as other keto brownies I've had, but perfect when you need a sweet treat. I recently went fishing with the family and I took one as a treat for my self. They are perfect for on the go. When everyone else is eating non keto , you don't feel left out. You can have a desert too, but with out all the carbs and sugar. I love to add a tbs of peanut butter on these .
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Old and stale
customer_reviews.text: This product was old and stale when it arrived. It had started to decompose when I opened the package. Chocolate had turned a grayish color. Obviously, old product was shipped. The only reason 1 star was given was because I couldn't submit this review without some rating. It doesn't deserve 1 star.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer Tracey

customer_reviews.title: Like a low carb Snickers! Yum!
customer_reviews.text: These are a great indulgence. They remind me of Snickers! They are good sized bars. Wish they came in minis so I could spread them throughout the day. I never eat more than one. When I tried to set this up for monthly delivery, they said they couldn't do that till fall because of the melting problem. The chocolaty coating in some of my boxes was light colored, like chocolate that freezes then thaws, less appetizing, but still tasted great!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn C. B.

customer_reviews.title: Rock hard and not edible.  Something went wrong with this batch
customer_reviews.text: There was a problem with these bars. They are rock hard and flat. I almost broke my tooth trying to eat one. I dont know what happened to the product, if something went wrong during production or shipping...but these are not the way they are supposed to be. They have always been delicious, soft and chewy before. Maybe just a bad batch?
customer_reviews.author: CorsoGuy

customer_reviews.title: Satisfies a candy craving
customer_reviews.text: I don’t follow the Atkins diet (I actually lost 35-40lbs on Noom and most of these snack bars are yellow foods) but these bars make a nice substitute for a candy bar craving. I love the caramel nut bars and these are great too! I’d say they’re like a middle ground between a real brownie and a Fiber One “brownie”. Great texture and the nuts are satisfying. The chocolate melts and doesn’t have that sugar-free taste. Much cheaper on amazon than at target at CVS. I’ll be stocking up!
customer_reviews.author: LauraThe3xplora

customer_reviews.title: I can taste the sweetener
customer_reviews.text: Not for me. I usually don't like to use sweeteners in my coffee because I can get the aftertaste. This is the same. I have been eating one bar for the past two days. A bite or two is fine but more than that is too sickly sweet. The texture is fine though. And I do appreciate the frosting. If you can stomach artificial sweetener then this is a good sweet. I don't know if Russell Stover sugar free chocolates are keto or not. But I don't get an after taste in those. And they taste amazing. Especially the pecan pralines, mint, and peanut butter cups.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Cooray

customer_reviews.title: These are the most satisfying Atkins chocolate snacks
customer_reviews.text: I cannot say enough about these. One can actually do the job if you’re a chocoholic like me (but two really makes you feel like you have cheated and quite satisfied). I put mine in the refrigerator-just the way I like them. They can melt just a little but some people may like that. For me, I love the other Atkins snacks, but I can eat the whole box before I feel satisfied. These do the trick. Yes, pretty much have no will power around chocolate.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle tannehill

customer_reviews.title: A great substitute when everyone else is having cake
customer_reviews.text: I bring along an Atkins nutty fudge brownie bar when I go to birthday parties and know I'm going to have to resist cake... That way I can still have a sweet treat while everyone else is eating cake! I also keep these stocked for "that time of the month" when I get positively DESPERATE for chocolate. The flavor is great (not weird like some low carb chocolate options) and eating this brownie feels really indulgent.
customer_reviews.author: Elley Murray

customer_reviews.title: REALLY GREAT TASTE LOW ON SUGAR/CARBS
customer_reviews.text: WOW! Is all I can say. I just bought these recently, they are great. If you love chocolate and coconut, you will love these great tasting bars, good size. Low in sugar and carbs. I always loved the Mounds and other coconut bars but I don't eat those because of the sugar and carbs. I just ordered other varieties also. Yes these are more expensive, but great if you want to cut sugar and carbs.
customer_reviews.author: Special K

customer_reviews.title: I don't normally have a sweet tooth, however
customer_reviews.text: I don't normally have a sweet tooth, however, my first week getting into Keto, I immediately had an insane desire for something sweet, and of course chocolaty. Of course went to Amazon to see what they had available and came across these delicious looking brownies. I was not looking forward to the taste, assuming it would be horrible tasting, dry and chalky, but I was pleasantly surprised! They are the perfect size to get over your sweet snack desire, taste/smell delicious, and the nuts on top are a perfect addition. This is my "go to" sweet snack and I don't feel guilty about it! They're amazing!
customer_reviews.author: CAS

customer_reviews.title: Faux Cosmic Brownie!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Nutty Fudge Brownie Bars and absolutely love them. They are a bit on the small side, but they're so delicious. If you've ever had a Cosmic Brownie, they're that texture, just with nuts instead of the multicolored candy coated chocolate chips. I'm personally a huge fan of Cosmic Brownies so this was a major hit with me and I would absolutely recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: McKenzie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent treat
customer_reviews.text: If you've been on Atkins a while, you'll understand the purple label means "endulge." And that's exactly what this brownie tastes like - it is really good! The chocolate is creamy & the nuts on top are crunchy - it's like I'm cheating on my diet! Tastes very similar to the "little debbie" brownies. I have found them cheaper locally, so shop around.
customer_reviews.author: RMM

customer_reviews.title: Not my favorite Atkins treat
customer_reviews.text: I love the Fudge Brownies these are based off of. So in theory, this should be my favorite Atkins treat. It most definitely is not. The chocolate tastes super fake. Similar to those Snackwells cookies they used to make. The nuts were good. They looked delicious. I will never purchase again. However, I do LOVE the Atkins Chocolate coconut bars, so am a fan of the brand, but not this particular product.
customer_reviews.author: Anna S.

customer_reviews.title: Delicious! Cures the sweet tooth guilt free!
customer_reviews.text: I have used many Atkins products, but recently discovered the "Atkins Endulge" line. WOW! THESE BROWNIES ARE FABULOUS! I have tried most of their bars with chocolate and I love all of them. It feels like a real cheat! Their Endulge peanut butter cups are also amazing. The regular Atkins line of peanut butter cups do not compare to their Endulge peanut butter cups. I still enjoy the regular Atkins bars, but the Endulge line is extra special!
customer_reviews.author: Juli

customer_reviews.title: nut shell ruined my implant post!
customer_reviews.text: Ive been using these for a few months and wish I never had. When I was chewing a bar a hard large piece of nut shell smashed over my implant post! Pretty expensive problem to deal with now. Atkins need some quality control!!!
customer_reviews.author: Vana

customer_reviews.title: Most delicious snack ever
customer_reviews.text: Keto or not keto be damned -- this is most delicious little snack treat I ever tasted. I don't even like sweets, I just wanted something to mix up the keto monotony. I saw some other reviews saying that this was bland. I swear to God we cannot have tasted the same bar. I've been to Portland Oregon too many times and had the best food on the planet and there is no denying how delicious this is. I would expect something that tastes like this to be in a high-end bakery. One disclaimer though, I don't actually know how keto friendly this is so be careful. They really ought be using stevia to sweeten it.
customer_reviews.author: Jevans87

customer_reviews.title: Actually..... pretty good.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a way of getting a dessert that wouldn't add a lot of sugar to my diet. I not diabetic, just looking to lose some weight. They were surprisingly good. The closest thing I can think of are Cosmic Brownies from Little Debbie. No. They aren't fresh homemade brownies. But for little sugar, less than 200 kCal and with protein, they're pretty great.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Z

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I really should give this a bad review because these are just way too good. I want to eat the whole box!!! I do really wish they were a little lower in calories and maybe made with darker chocolate, but I’ve been dieting for 2 months, so they tasted extra sweet to me because I haven’t had very many sweets lately. If ate them for a quick meal instead of a snack, it wouldn’t be bad though.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Haling

customer_reviews.title: Not for Keto
customer_reviews.text: The main sweetener is Maltitol. Would not have purchased had I read into these a little better. Absolutely delicious, but with current studies on the sweetener used, I wouldn’t recommend for people on Keto. That’s not to say once I’m satisfied with my weight loss I wouldn’t buy these again to limit actual sugar intake, but these should be indulged rarely.
customer_reviews.author: Michael P.

customer_reviews.title: Not the best I’ve tried
customer_reviews.text: These looked scrumptious. However, upon receiving they were kind of flattened out and the taste was less than I was anticipating. I was thinking it would be some thing like a payday bar in flavor but it really wasn’t. I’m not sure I’ll be re-ordering this item but I do like many of the other Atkins items. Perhaps it was a bad batch or it was in the heat too long.
customer_reviews.author: Edon Ben-Artzi

customer_reviews.title: Surprised by the texture
customer_reviews.text: Since it is Atkins, I assumed it would be higher protein, giving it that familiar Tootsie Roll texture. Then I saw the protein isn't that high, and the texture was like a (wait for it.....) fudge brownie! I did see another reviewer mention that it spikes blood sugar due to the sweeteners used. I have one or two left, and will have to check that out.
customer_reviews.author: Rich D Bakerguy

customer_reviews.title: its health food with 2G Net Carbs
customer_reviews.text: Currently I'm on the Keto diet. I got these to mix up my fat bombs. Granted these have some weird ingredients and taste like health food, they aren't so bad. I prefer them cold, so I put them in the freezer. 2G Net Carbs is great. They are tiny. I really only got them cause they were on sale and let me take a break from making my own bars.
customer_reviews.author: JasonG

customer_reviews.title: Chocolate Cravings...SATISFIED!! ^_^
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE these Atkins Nutty Fudge Brownie Bars!! My boyfriend had bought these and I was skeptical, since I'm a chocoholic, but they're actually pretty tasty. They definitely cure that chocolate fix when I need it. They kind of remind me of the Little Debbie Fudge Brownies, but not quite as...greasy, I guess. Super glad to have these on-hand while I'm starting with the Keto meal plans!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Lynn

customer_reviews.title: They look like brownies...
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice looking walnut topped brownies, however the taste is incredibly chemical and not at all chocolatey or fudgey. I tried to eat one because the price is pretty steep, but after 2 bites, it ended in the trash. Tries a week later to see if maybe I was mistaken, same chemical taste.
customer_reviews.author: Verukka

customer_reviews.title: Arrived melty TWICE
customer_reviews.text: I think these would’ve tasted great, but they arrived on the melted side. Then I requested a replacement and THEY were melted too. I grabbed them as soon as I got the text from amazon that they were delivered. Maybe amazon needs to start thinking about shipping chocolatey items with a cold pack . Although I refrigerated the first batch and they had a stale taste to them. Guess I’m better off finding them in a local store and price matching through amazon in the future. Or buying in the winter!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tastes like a regular chocolate bar
customer_reviews.text: I really like these. On my indulge list. When you really look at the net carbs its a zero treat due to the fiber content. They are especially great coming out of the freezer, because they don't freeze all the way through but taste great when chewed nice and cool. Price is another great bonus. They are inexpensive for what you get and compared to other products Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Melinda

customer_reviews.title: Love These for the Same Reasons I Probably Won’t Buy Them Again
customer_reviews.text: I found something too chocolatey for me by the last couple bites! I guess that’s good, I won’t eat a whole bar every time. I don’t know what I was thinking when I ordered these, but I don’t like nuts in brownies! It turned out okay because it’s not overloaded with them, (and the chocolatey part I mentioned). I really liked them but I’m not sure I will buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: ArtsyLady

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT CONSUME!!!
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t even realize there was a CANCER WARNING on these brownie snacks! I started researching and they contain lead They are on a list with many other popular food items that are known to cause cancers shame on these companies for doing this PLAIN AND SIMPLE DO NOT BUY!!!!
customer_reviews.author: melisa lopez

customer_reviews.title: Tasty!
customer_reviews.text: My husband has type 2 diabetes and hasn't seen a spike in sugar levels after 1 of these. He hasn't tried eating more than one in a sitting. He's not big on sweets, but he loves brownies. He says they are pretty similar to little debbie walnut brownies. I have a sweet tooth and I thought they were pretty good, too! They don't taste diet-y!
customer_reviews.author: Yrios

customer_reviews.title: I just love these bars
customer_reviews.text: I've always loved these bars as the chocolate is very good and the coconut is super! However when they came they were mush for having been sitting in my mail box for 2 hours. I had to put them in the refrigerator before I could eat one. It was worth the wait as they are still as good as always!
customer_reviews.author: P.A. Vegas

customer_reviews.title: I will buy again in cooler weather ...
customer_reviews.text: The dessert was delicious but unfortunately it arrived on the hottest day so far this year. Therefore, it was completely melted and arrived in an envelope type packaging which made it worse. It was melted and smashed, what a mess. After refrigeration It was still stuck to the paper and messy to eat. In my opinion, it should have at least arrived in a box instead of an envelope.
customer_reviews.author: B Edwards

customer_reviews.title: satisfies low carb chocolate craving
customer_reviews.text: Ok so these are not quite like actual brownies, but for a low carb version I think they are great. They are soft with nuts and a layer of frosting, so they are sweet and very satisfying. They leave a bit of a strange aftertaste is my only complaint. Not quite enough to take off a star. 4.5 stars if that was an option.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting this to taste like a protein bar but it doesn't. These brownies are delicious! Topped with a rich chocolaty fudgy icing. perfect combination of rich chocolate, sweet, salty and chewy. I had to keep checking the box label to check the carbs and sugar. Delicious! I'll be buying these again!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Johnson

customer_reviews.title: First bite was the best then it went downhill
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for an alternative to chocolate cake or brownies- keto friendly. These were great when you first bit into them. It was nice and chocolaty with a nut crunch but then the second bite, i started tasting an aftertaste. By the time I finished, my whole mouth had that aftertaste.
customer_reviews.author: TL

customer_reviews.title: Fudgy chocolate walnut brownies yum
customer_reviews.text: Ever since we're in this pandemic and I haven't gone to the grocery store for a long time now and being on a low carb diet, trying to satisfy a chocolatey sweet tooth, this brownie hits the spot! It has a fudgy chocolaty yumminess with walnuts. Just the right size for portion control.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Deliciously Addictive!
customer_reviews.text: I did not expect this to taste like a "turtle" chocolate treat but happily it did. It really has no aftertaste and is very good. A serving is 2 little packages but if dieting one can cut down easily by just eating one single package and not feel like one is cheating or over indulging. Really nice to have a treat without feeling too guilty about it. And, it is a treat!
customer_reviews.author: Orphan

customer_reviews.title: Not THAT bad...
customer_reviews.text: Better to freeze them, not compare to what a real brownie would taste like, maybe hold your nose? It's better than the Slim Fast Fat Bomb peanut butter cups - although that's still not saying anything. I'll eat these grudgingly trying to pretend they're sweeter than they are...
customer_reviews.author: zophra

customer_reviews.title: SO SO GOOD
customer_reviews.text: Oh my goodness, these are SO GOOD! I never have very high expectations for anything “diet,” but Atkins bars really are the exception. This particular flavor is so much like having a full-fat, sugar-loaded Payday candy bar that I can hardly tell the difference!!! I’m not typically a candy bar person, but these are my favorite treats! If you like Payday candy bars, you should definitely try these Atkins bars!! Delicious!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shanna Banana

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like this item! Since I have been eating sugar free stuff I've noticed two things: 1) many leave an after taste 2) many are hard. These were harder than I like. I lik soft brownies, and these are no where near soft. Also, I didn't care for the flavor of them. I was considering buying other Adkins item , but not after trying these.
customer_reviews.author: Miss LAB

customer_reviews.title: Good taste somewhat pricey
customer_reviews.text: Good taste and low carbs ...but don't eat more than 3 atkins candy since can cause big digestive discomfort they use sweeteners that can cause diarrhea and intestinal discomfort ..price probably should drop by 20 percent...similar products with same taste like pure protein are cheaper at dollar tree
customer_reviews.author: Jeff lindstrom

customer_reviews.title: Protein powder kind of taste
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I love this brand, and I am fun of brownie but currently I'm eating keto. It has 16 g total carb which is more than other sweet snack options and its portion is very small for this. Its flavor reminds me of the protein powder, so it is not my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Ece

customer_reviews.title: Gives you horrible gas you won’t stop farting until it’s out of your system.
customer_reviews.text: These will give you the worst gas you ever had in your entire life. You will do some serious “crop dusting” at work. The gas is so bad you will have trouble sleeping. It’s not worth it. The gas will last until you void this product from your body.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Tastes alot like Little Debbie
customer_reviews.text: I think that's a compliment, really. No one thinks of Little Debbies as tasting like a homemade brownie, and these don't either. However, they have a good flavor, supply a sweet-tasting snack without the sugar, and contain protein. They have a layer of chocolate-like dip on the bottom of the bar that makes them less crumby, too. If you have found my review to be helpful, please click "yes" below. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke G.

customer_reviews.title: Not nearly as good as they used to be.
customer_reviews.text: When the whole Atkins diet was a big thing, I bought these regularly. They were great then. Fast forward 15 years... Atkins is a bigger food brand...less of a fad diet. The brownie bars are half the size and half covered in a waxy chocolate. Not my thing.
customer_reviews.author: YBA

customer_reviews.title: Low carbs and no sugar
customer_reviews.text: Love these things. As a type II diabetic trying low carb these items help. I have been a type II for 44 years and it is not always easy to stay off of high sugar or high carbs when everyone around you is munching and eating high sugar and carbs. Now I have something to snack on good for me and keeps me in my range and not expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Bergen

customer_reviews.title: Just like a payday bar!
customer_reviews.text: One of my guilty pleasures is the salted nut roll. This Atkins bar totally fills that crave for the salty-sweet flavor and the peanut/marshmallow texture with no guilt! Not as much protein as a regular meal bar, but nonetheless it is snack you can feel good about.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Indulge in Endulge without Guilt
customer_reviews.text: Tasty treat for low carb, low glycemic dietary needs! At 170 calories it tastes like an indulgence with 5 grams of fiber and 7 grams of protein . Although there are 10 grams of sugar alcohols, only 1 gram of sugar, the flavor is delicious.
customer_reviews.author: TLH

customer_reviews.title: Keep looking - not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: These are super sweet and have a chemical aftertaste. There are several other Atkins products that are better flavored. For some reason, this just doesn’t measure up to the other Atkins products I’ve tried. Will not be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Kopecky

customer_reviews.title: Payday Like Bars! No crash!
customer_reviews.text: My husband is doing Keto and I'm on a higher protein diet after rebuilding from cancer. This is one candy like bar we both eat because there's no blood sugar peaks, it doesn't throw him out of ketosis.... even tastes like a payday bar! Yum!
customer_reviews.author: DBHawaii

customer_reviews.title: Horrid bars
customer_reviews.text: Disgusting 🤮 At any store your able to return products but you aren’t able to return these bars through amazon just so you are aware. I have a box full of disgusting bars (these bars aren’t cheap) that I am not going to eat.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Prajapati

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: I don't know where to start. These brownies are my go-to for everything. They are small, yet satisfying and hold me over for quite some time. They also taste like real brownies/chocolate. The nuts give it some extra deliciousness. I've already gone through about 3 boxes and I will definitely buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT buy!
customer_reviews.text: These are obviously factory rejects as they are flattened, discolored or previously melted. Attempts to provide pictures of unopened and opened packages was to no avail on this review. I am extremely disappointed to receive such low quality merchandise and I’ll not be taken advantage of like this again. There was no bargain with this buy!
customer_reviews.author: Daune A

customer_reviews.title: Good tasting bar
customer_reviews.text: These I use for my diet and as a snack they are good. The only problem is when I got them they had melted in the truck. I had to put them in the refrigerator to make them solid. They could be a bigger bar for what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Theodore C.

customer_reviews.title: Price keeps going up!
customer_reviews.text: Love having this as a treat but it's cheaper to buy at Walmart. It's strange but EVERYTIME I buy something from Atkins, the price shoots up when I want to reorder. These are $7 a box which adds up. The only reason I bought it was because I had an Amazon gift card and they were only $6.30 a box.
customer_reviews.author: Laura B.

customer_reviews.title: 4 bars in the box :(
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been trying to find the best keto treat and not spend too much because I’ve already adjusted and spent quite a bit to switch up the foods in my pantry. I was hoping to eat 1 brownie per day for the week. Well, this came in and the box only had 4 brownies inside. The box says 5 servings. I feel ripped off. I also found out this is not a good product for keto because of the malitol used.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Tastes Yummy but my item arrived open
customer_reviews.text: I received two boxes of these little treats. They are yummy but I was disappointed upon arrival that one of my boxes was open and not packaged well. Outside of that snafu, these treats are delicious and help me stay on track when I need a chocolate fix.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Arrived stale, clumped together and inedible
customer_reviews.text: I gave two stars because I have purchased these off the shelf in a grocery store and they tasted fine and were just what I expected. The sweetener has a good flavor and no aftertaste. The chocolate could be darker and more flavorful IMO but it was good. The product delivered from Amazon was stale, white on the outside and crumbly. It didn't have the flavor I normally get at the grocery store. I threw it all out as I don't have time for returns. Ill purchase off the shelf next time.
customer_reviews.author: Dragon Martinez 101

customer_reviews.title: Serious Gas and Bloating
customer_reviews.text: I thought these were great for a treat and ordered a bunch more before I realized it caused so much gas and bloating. I eat pretty clean so I’m for sure that this is the culprit. When the new boxes come, i’ll be sending right back.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Mmmmmmm!
customer_reviews.text: I love these candies. They taste just like M&Ms without all the sugar. Since I am diabetic, these give me sweet snack I need. They are a little bit more expensive, but since no stores around me carry them, they are still a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Leonardo

customer_reviews.title: Worth It! Delicious Meal Replacement or Candy Bar!
customer_reviews.text: Worth it! Keto Friendly, but it’s mostly a candy bar with less junk. I Love these as a meal replacement on the go, or a late night ginger distraction if I’ve worked too late to eat am actual meal. Also, delicious!
customer_reviews.author: WorthItorNotWorthIt

customer_reviews.title: Great taste - portion wisely!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love the taste! In my opinion, it could go head to head with a real brownie! However, definitely recommend portioning them. Because of the sugar replacements, they tend to have a bit of a "laxative" quality if too many are eaten.
customer_reviews.author: Mikinna Russell

customer_reviews.title: Addictive
customer_reviews.text: i don't particularly fancy writing reviews but I had to for this. I'm totally addicted. Love,love,love these bars and they keep me on ketosis. Thank you for an awesome alternative to snacking. My only issue is there should be more than 5 bars in a box 😁.....
customer_reviews.author: trinigirl

customer_reviews.title: Item mishandled
customer_reviews.text: I received these Atkins bars for quite some time. This time the bars were hard like bricks. The expiration date was August 2020, so product must have been mishandled. I cancelled my subscribe and save order.
customer_reviews.author: kp

customer_reviews.title: Brownie: Didn’t like the texture and taste
customer_reviews.text: There was something about the chocolate layer on the bottom that was so awesome putting in texture and taste I am upset that I bought two boxes without trying
customer_reviews.author: Brit

customer_reviews.title: Yummy low carb sweet craving
customer_reviews.text: Being on a strict diet not eating that much sweets, however i do celebrate for a couple pounds lost with a treat and this is one of my favorite. It does help with the cravings, it taste really yummy. I would recommend anyone this treat if you love the peanut cluster chocolate candy. I will purchase this product again when I am out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Atkins Bar
customer_reviews.text: Of all the Atkins bars, I have found this one to be one of the best. It seems to satisfy my craving for chocolate yet it is not too much. I would recommend this to anyone that wants to buy any Atkins bars.
customer_reviews.author: Hilary K.

customer_reviews.title: Get em for the taste
customer_reviews.text: Honestly these are so good I don’t see how anything is “reduced“ compared to regular pure sugary desserts. I don’t buy them because they’re maybe a little healthier. I buy them because they’re delicious.
customer_reviews.author: SoCalBeachRunner

customer_reviews.title: Better alternative to real brownies but knocks me out of keto
customer_reviews.text: These taste no different from real brownies, and I tested it sixr by side with a real brownie. How can these stats omnthese be real? I can taste no trace of fake sugar. That makes me a little cautious. Taste great though.
customer_reviews.author: Lincoln Elliot

customer_reviews.title: It's a brownie; so, yum.
customer_reviews.text: If you want an deeply chocolate brownie experience on Atkin's, then look no further. I like the flavor but feel that Atkin's does better with some of their other offerings. I would buy again for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Meh...not terrible but not my favorite
customer_reviews.text: Like many foods meant to replace treats this one comes down OK but the after taste is a bummer. Gave them to my Type 1 diabetic daughter-in-law. Love the Keto and Co Dudge Brownie Mix purchased on Amazon WAY more than these.
customer_reviews.author: M. Drake Brandt

customer_reviews.title: The texture is the only high point of these things
customer_reviews.text: The first bite was nice. The consistency of one of those iced and boxed super processed brownies. But hey, when we keto people crave sweet stuff, sometimes it’s the weird stuff. However, the flavor was off and my diarrhea was unpleasant. You don’t get any chocolate flavor. Only the placebo taste of the rich appealing dark brown color fools you.
customer_reviews.author: Cranjis McBasketball

customer_reviews.title: Look very yummy.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for part of a Valentine's Day gift for my Grandmother. They were larger then I expected them to be and they looked very yummy. I actually wanted to try them & I am not diabetic.
customer_reviews.author: Heather S.

customer_reviews.title: Stale feeling.
customer_reviews.text: I am all for keto products. Despite tasting good, this product is a bit hard to chew. It is very similar to taffy. If I had sensitive teeth or even braces, this bar would be really uncomfortable or dangerous to eat.
customer_reviews.author: JCS

customer_reviews.title: Yuck
customer_reviews.text: Atkins has some really great tasting bars. These are not one of those. My neck actually snapped back a little in shock at the unpleasant taste. Think partially dried playdough mixed with chocolate. No, thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Ah Mazin

customer_reviews.title: Seriously delicious treat
customer_reviews.text: I loved this treat - small size, packed with 170 calories (yikes), but only 2g of carbs so if you balance out your meals/treats this is acceptable. Very soft and fudge with the right amount of nuts.
customer_reviews.author: Maxine

product_meta.title: Atkins Endulge Treat Nutty Fudge Brownie Bar. Decadent Brownie Treat with Chocolatey Coating and Walnuts. Keto-Friendly. (5 Bars)
product_meta.description: Flavor:Nutty Fudge BrownieTHE ATKINS MISSION. Atkins’ purpose is to improve global health and to help people understand that eating right is about both losing weight and becoming healthy. That’s done through the use of imagination, innovation, partnerships and commitment to science to make it easy to eat right. NUTTY FUDGE BROWNIE BAR. Atkins' treats help support your low carb lifestyle without compromising flavor. This bar delivers all the chewy, chocolatey taste you crave with none of the guilt. So the next time you need some sweetness, reach for this scrumptious brownie treat with walnuts and a chocolatey coating. WHAT’S INSIDE. Let this keto-friendly* treat delight your taste buds while keeping your lifestyle on track. Includes 1 pack of 5 individually wrapped 1.41 oz bars with 7 grams of protein, 5 grams of fiber, 2 grams of net carbs and 1 gram of sugar per serving.*When used with Atkins ketogenic programs EAT RIGHT. NOT LESS. Cardiologist Dr. Robert C. Atkins saw that eating right, not less, improved his patients’ health - not just in terms of weight loss but also reducing chronic issues. Over the last 45 years, mounting evidence is revealing that Dr. Atkins was right. PUBLIC HEALTH ADVOCACY. The “Atkins Diet” started as a fad, but quickly became a counter-conventional movement that reset people’s understanding of nutrition and weight loss, and its link to health. Atkins public health advocacy has played a significant role in updating dietary guidelines, moving them from less and towards right.
feature_bullets: NUTTY FUDGE BROWNIE BAR. Let this Atkins Endulge Treat delight your taste buds while keeping you true to your lifestyle. Includes 1 pack of 5 individually wrapped 1.41 oz bars.

STAY ON TRACK. Our Nutty Fudge Brownie Bar provides 7 grams of protein and 5 grams of fiber per serving to help you achieve your daily goals. And, with 2 grams of net carbs and 1 gram of sugar per serving, this treat is perfect for a keto-friendly* lifestyle.*When used with Atkins ketogenic programs
ALL TASTE. NO GUILT. Moist, chewy brownie treats with walnuts and a chocolatey coating, these bars deliver all the taste you crave with none of the guilt.
SMART SNACKING. Atkins’ delicious and nutritious treats strike the perfect balance of indulgence and smart snacking.
SOMETHING FOR EVERYONE. Atkins Endulge Treats have their own unique textures and flavors, offering the variety needed to satisfy all your cravings and help support your lifestyle.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
